text: The European Canoe Association (ECA) is the umbrella organization for canoeing sport in Europe. It was founded in Rome, Italy, on December 11, 1993. The organization has 45 member countries.Federations The association was recognized by the International Canoe Federation at the ICF congress in Acapulco in 1994. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Canoeing Canoe association Category:Sports organizations of Croatia
title: European Canoe Association
